description:
Zeus rewards his students with a play in recognition of their strong performance on the midterm exam. Everyone is shocked when Thoth orders them to put on a play for the whole school tomorrow, but Apollon cheerfully declares they can do it together.
Deciding on Cinderella, Yui plays Cinderella at the recommendation of the gods, but who will be wed to Cinderella--?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 愛すべき日常[うたかた]
